laboratory_examinations.findings: Loss of methylation (LOM) of the KCNQ1OT1:TSS DMR (Imprinting Centre 2, IC2) in both twins.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In a follow-up analysis, methylation levels for IC2 LOM were confirmed in ST using DNA from buccal mucosa by pyrosequencing, while FT's methylation level was comparable to normal controls.
